GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 14 August 2025
Several spells of showers will occur in the Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Kandy, Nuwara-
Eliya, Galle and Matara districts.

A
 few showers may occur in North-western and Northern provinces.

F
airly strong winds of about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times over Western slopes of the central
hills and in Northern, North-central, North-western and Southern provinces and in Trincomalee district.
